title: Altinn layout sets
description: Schema that describes the different layout sets for an Altinn application and when to use them

hideCloseButton.title: Hide close button
hideCloseButton.description: Hide the close button in the upper right corner of the app

showLanguageSelector.title: Show language selector
showLanguageSelector.description: Show the language selector in the upper right corner of the app

showExpandWidthButton.title: Show expand width button
showExpandWidthButton.description: Show the expand width button in the upper right corner of the app

showProgress.title: Show progress indicator
showProgress.description: Enables a progress indicator in the upper right corner of the app (when on data tasks/forms)

autoSaveBehavior.title: Auto save behavior
autoSaveBehavior.description: An attribute specifying when the application will save form data. onChangeFormData saves on every interaction with form elements. onChangePage saves on every page change.

taskNavigation.title: Task navigation settings
taskNavigation.description: Shows the listed tasks in the sidebar navigation menu

id.title: ID
id.description: The layout-set ID. Must be unique within a given application.

dataType.title: Data type
dataType.description: The datatype to use this layout.

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.description: An array specifying which task to use a layout-set

ILayoutSets.title: Layout sets
ILayoutSets.description: Settings regarding layout pages and components

sets.title: Layout sets
sets.description: List of layout sets for different data types

ILayoutSetSubform.title: Layout Set
ILayoutSetSubform.description: A layout set with either tasks or type, but not both.

id.title: ID
id.description: The layout-set ID. Must be unique within a given application.

dataType.title: Data type
dataType.description: The datatype to use this layout.

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of layout set, here subform.
